languages.text: "Господа наши новые, Ультреквизиторы, ведут себя чинно. Грамотеев, правда, привечают, а от них лихо одно. Но зато за службу троны давать начали. Где ж видано такое? Я и в жизни-то трона не видал, а тут за месяц работы — ажно двумя жалуют!"

"Our new masters, the Ultrequisitors, they're a dignified bunch. They fancy the learned type, though, and no good ever comes from scholars. But on the upside, they are paying you thrones for your service. Can you believe it? I hadn't seen a throne in my whole life, and they are giving us two for every month's work!"
languages.original_text: "Господа наши новые, Ультреквизиторы, ведут себя чинно. Грамотеев, правда, привечают, а от них лихо одно. Но зато за службу троны давать начали. Где ж видано такое? Я и в жизни-то трона не видал, а тут за месяц работы — ажно двумя жалуют!"

But on the upside, they give you thrones for your service. Can you believe it? I hadn't seen a throne in my life, and they pay you two for every month's work!"

But on the upside, they are paying you thrones for your service. Can you believe it? I hadn't seen a throne in my whole life, and they are giving us two for every month's work!"

languages.text: “我们的新主人叫巨贩帮，他们都是体面人。虽然他们喜欢那些博学的人，但老实说，那些学者从来都不干好事。不过这事儿也有好的一面，你替他们干活，他们就给你钱。你敢信吗？我之前一辈子都没见过王座币，可他们现在每个月都会给我两枚！”
languages.original_text: "Our new masters, the Ultrequisitors, they're a dignified bunch. They fancy the learned type, though, and no good ever comes from scholars. But on the upside, they are paying you thrones for your service. Can you believe it? I hadn't seen a throne in my whole life, and they are giving us two for every month's work!"

traits.locale_text: “我们的新主人叫巨贩帮，他们都是体面人。虽然他们喜欢那些博学的人，但老实说，那些学者从来都不干好事。不过这事儿也有好的一面，你替他们干活，他们就给你钱。你敢信吗？我之前一辈子都没见过王座币，可他们现在每个月都会给我两枚！”

languages.text: 「私らの新しい主、ウルトレクイジターは、威厳のある集団です。彼らは知識のある者たちを好むらしいが、学者から良いことは生まれません。でも良い面を考えれば、彼らは奉仕の報酬として、スローンを支払ってくれます。信じられますか？私は人生で一度もスローンを見たことはなかったのに、今は、一か月働くごとに2スローンもくれるんです！」
languages.original_text: "Our new masters, the Ultrequisitors, they're a dignified bunch. They fancy the learned type, though, and no good ever comes from scholars. But on the upside, they are paying you thrones for your service. Can you believe it? I hadn't seen a throne in my whole life, and they are giving us two for every month's work!"

traits.locale_text: 「私らの新しい主、ウルトレクイジターは、威厳のある集団です。彼らは知識のある者たちを好むらしいが、学者から良いことは生まれません。でも良い面を考えれば、彼らは奉仕の報酬として、スローンを支払ってくれます。信じられますか？私は人生で一度もスローンを見たことはなかったのに、今は、一か月働くごとに2スローンもくれるんです！」

languages.text: «Nuestros nuevos amos, los Ultrequisadores, son un grupo bastante digno. Pero se las dan de listos y los eruditos nunca traen nada bueno. Eso sí, pagan en tronos por el servicio. ¿Se lo puede creer? No había visto un trono en mi vida, ¡y ahora nos pagan dos al mes!».
languages.original_text: "Our new masters, the Ultrequisitors, they're a dignified bunch. They fancy the learned type, though, and no good ever comes from scholars. But on the upside, they are paying you thrones for your service. Can you believe it? I hadn't seen a throne in my whole life, and they are giving us two for every month's work!"

traits.locale_text: «Nuestros nuevos amos, los Ultrequisadores, son un grupo bastante digno. Pero se las dan de listos y los eruditos nunca traen nada bueno. Eso sí, pagan en tronos por el servicio. ¿Se lo puede creer? No había visto un trono en mi vida, ¡y ahora nos pagan dos al mes!».

languages.text: "Eure neuen Meister, die Ultrequisitoren, sind ein würdevoller Haufen. Aber sie halten sich für gebildete Leute, und von Gelehrten kommt nie etwas Gutes. Was aber gut ist, sie bezahlen einem Thronmünzen, wenn man für sie arbeitet. Ist das zu fassen? Ich hatte mein ganzes Leben lang noch nie eine Thronmünze gesehen, und die geben uns für jeden Monat Arbeit gleich zwei!"
languages.original_text: "Our new masters, the Ultrequisitors, they're a dignified bunch. They fancy the learned type, though, and no good ever comes from scholars. But on the upside, they are paying you thrones for your service. Can you believe it? I hadn't seen a throne in my whole life, and they are giving us two for every month's work!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure neuen Meister, die Ultrequisitoren, sind ein würdevoller Haufen. Aber sie halten sich für gebildete Leute, und von Gelehrten kommt nie etwas Gutes. Was aber gut ist, sie bezahlen einem Thronmünzen, wenn man für sie arbeitet. Ist das zu fassen? Ich hatte mein ganzes Leben lang noch nie eine Thronmünze gesehen, und die geben uns für jeden Monat Arbeit gleich zwei!"

languages.text: « Nos nouveaux maîtres, les Ultréquisiteurs, ils sont sacrément honorables. Par contre, ils préfèrent les gens éduqués, alors que tout le monde sait qu'il faut jamais rien attendre des érudits. Au moins, ils paient nos services en espèces sonnantes et trébuchantes. Vous y croyez, vous ? J'avais jamais eu un seul trône de ma vie, et voilà qu'ils nous en donnent deux par mois travaillé ! »
languages.original_text: "Our new masters, the Ultrequisitors, they're a dignified bunch. They fancy the learned type, though, and no good ever comes from scholars. But on the upside, they are paying you thrones for your service. Can you believe it? I hadn't seen a throne in my whole life, and they are giving us two for every month's work!"

traits.locale_text: « Nos nouveaux maîtres, les Ultréquisiteurs, ils sont sacrément honorables. Par contre, ils préfèrent les gens éduqués, alors que tout le monde sait qu'il faut jamais rien attendre des érudits. Au moins, ils paient nos services en espèces sonnantes et trébuchantes. Vous y croyez, vous ? J'avais jamais un seul trône de ma vie, et voilà qu'ils nous en donnent deux par mois travaillé ! »

languages.text: "Yeni efendilerimiz, Ultragizisyoncular pek ağırbaşlı kimseler. Okuyanı yazanı severler ama âlim adamdan kime ne hayır gelmiş? Gerçi hizmet edenin karşılığını da ödüyorlar. Duyun da inanmayın! Bu yaşıma geldim, bir tanecik sikke görmedim. Şimdi her ay başında iki tane ödüyorlar!"
languages.original_text: "Our new masters, the Ultrequisitors, they're a dignified bunch. They fancy the learned type, though, and no good ever comes from scholars. But on the upside, they are paying you thrones for your service. Can you believe it? I hadn't seen a throne in my whole life, and they are giving us two for every month's work!"

traits.locale_text: "Yeni efendilerimiz, Ultragizisyoncular pek ağırbaşlı kimseler. Okuyanı yazanı severler ama alim adamdan kime ne hayır gelmiş? Gerçi hizmet edenin karşılığını da ödüyorlar. Duyun da inanmayın! Bu yaşıma geldim, bir tanecik sikke görmedim. Şimdi her ay başında iki tane ödüyorlar!"
